info.title: Product Master (A2X)
info.description: You can perform the CRUD operations on product master data records at the entity level. This service supports the operations â€“ GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update and delete master data for products using this synchronous inbound service
